p: 1,8-Cineole, citronellal, citronellic acid, citronellol, linalool, ( R)-limonene, ( R)-α-pinene, ( S)-β-pinene, ( R)-pulegone, α-terpinene, γ-terpinene, thymol and PBO used in the bioassays or as chromatographic standards were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich (St. Louis, MO, United States). HPLC grade acetone was purchased from Merck (Darmstadt, Germany).
